name: ode to the horizon
description:
this is the first piece of the collab between laissamoreira and headphaser.
each color has a specific note assigned.
audio was done with a roland sh-101 analog synthesizer and recorded to a tascam 4-track tape recorder.

---

the moon and the sun, what are they?

they are circles floating around in space

they are sliced

by the line of the horizon

they are always the same phenomenon to the back and front

they mark beginnings

middles

and ends

they are lovers, that will never meet

so they run in cycles and in circles 

after each other

one day after the other

bringing light and shadow to the most tiniest thing that ever existed

they are part of the mystery and excitement of experiencing life
